verses.text: Keep \w silence|strong="H2790"\w* before me, O \w islands|strong="H0339"\w*; and let the \w people|strong="H3816"\w* \w renew|strong="H2498"\w* \add their\add* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*: let them come \w near|strong="H5066"\w*; then let them \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*: let us come \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* to \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

Who raised \w up|strong="H5782"\w* the \w righteous|strong="H6664"\w* \add man\add* from the \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, \w called|strong="H7121"\w* him to his \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*, \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, and made \add him\add* \w rule|strong="H7287"\w* over \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*? he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \add them\add* as the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* to his \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \add and\add* as \w driven|strong="H5086"\w* \w stubble|strong="H7179"\w* to his \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*.\f + \fr 41.2 \ft the righteous…: Heb. righteousness\f*

He \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* them, \add and\add* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w safely|strong="H7965"\w*; \add even\add* by the \w way|strong="H0734"\w* \add that\add* he had not \w gone|strong="H0935"\w* with his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.\f + \fr 41.3 \ft safely: Heb. in peace\f*

Who hath \w wrought|strong="H6466"\w* and \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*, \w calling|strong="H7121"\w* the \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* from the \w beginning|strong="H7218"\w*? I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w first|strong="H7223"\w*, and with the \w last|strong="H0314"\w*; I \add am\add* he.

The \w isles|strong="H0339"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, and \w feared|strong="H3372"\w*; the \w ends|strong="H7098"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* were \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*, drew \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0857"\w*.

They \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*; and \add every one\add* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, Be of good \w courage|strong="H2388"\w*.\f + \fr 41.6 \ft Be…: Heb. Be strong\f*

So the \w carpenter|strong="H2796"\w* \w encouraged|strong="H2388"\w* the \w goldsmith|strong="H6884"\w*, \add and\add* he that \w smootheth|strong="H2505"\w* \add with\add* the \w hammer|strong="H6360"\w* him that \w smote|strong="H1986"\w* the \w anvil|strong="H6471"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, It \add is\add* \w ready|strong="H2896"\w* for the \w sodering|strong="H1694"\w*: and he \w fastened|strong="H2388"\w* it with \w nails|strong="H4548"\w*, \add that\add* it should not be \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*.\f + \fr 41.7 \ft goldsmith: or, founder\f*\f + \fr 41.7 \ft him…: or, the smiting\f*\f + \fr 41.7 \ft saying…: or, saying of the soder, It is good\f*

But thou, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add art\add* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* whom I have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*, the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* my \w friend|strong="H0157"\w*.

\add Thou\add* whom I have \w taken|strong="H2388"\w* from the \w ends|strong="H7098"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* thee from the chief \w men|strong="H0678"\w* thereof, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee, Thou \add art\add* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*; I have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* thee, and not cast thee \w away|strong="H3988"\w*.

¶ \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* thou not; for I \add am\add* with thee: be not \w dismayed|strong="H8159"\w*; for I \add am\add* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: I will \w strengthen|strong="H0553"\w* thee; yea, I will \w help|strong="H5826"\w* thee; yea, I will \w uphold|strong="H8551"\w* thee with the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* of my \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*.

Behold, all they that were \w incensed|strong="H2734"\w* against thee shall be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* and \w confounded|strong="H3637"\w*: they shall be as nothing; and \w they|strong="H0582"\w* that \w strive|strong="H7379"\w* with thee shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*.\f + \fr 41.11 \ft they that strive…: Heb. the men of thy strife\f*

Thou shalt \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* them, and shalt not \w find|strong="H4672"\w* them, \add even\add* \w them|strong="H0582"\w* that \w contended|strong="H4695"\w* with thee: they that \w war|strong="H4421"\w* against thee shall be as nothing, and as a thing of \w nought|strong="H0657"\w*.\f + \fr 41.12 \ft them that…: Heb. the men of thy contention\f*\f + \fr 41.12 \ft they…: Heb. the men of thy war\f*

For I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* not; I will \w help|strong="H5826"\w* thee.

\w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* not, thou \w worm|strong="H8438"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \add and\add* ye \w men|strong="H4962"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; I will \w help|strong="H5826"\w* thee, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and thy \w redeemer|strong="H1350"\w*, the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 41.14 \ft men: or, few men\f*

Behold, I will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* thee a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w sharp|strong="H2742"\w* \w threshing|strong="H4173"\w* instrument \w having|strong="H1167"\w* \w teeth|strong="H6374"\w*: thou shalt \w thresh|strong="H1758"\w* the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and beat \add them\add* \w small|strong="H1854"\w*, and shalt \w make|strong="H7760"\w* the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* as \w chaff|strong="H4671"\w*.\f + \fr 41.15 \ft teeth: Heb. mouths\f*

Thou shalt \w fan|strong="H2219"\w* them, and the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* shall carry them \w away|strong="H5375"\w*, and the \w whirlwind|strong="H5591"\w* shall \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* them: and thou shalt \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add and\add* shalt \w glory|strong="H1984"\w* in the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\add When\add* the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* and \w needy|strong="H0034"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and \add there is\add* none, \add and\add* their \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w faileth|strong="H5405"\w* for \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w*, I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w hear|strong="H6030"\w* them, I the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* will not \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* them.

I will \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* in high \w places|strong="H8205"\w*, and \w fountains|strong="H4599"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w valleys|strong="H1237"\w*: I will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* a \w pool|strong="H0098"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and the \w dry|strong="H6723"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w springs|strong="H4161"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

I will \w plant|strong="H5414"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* the \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w*, the shittah \w tree|strong="H7848"\w*, and the \w myrtle|strong="H1918"\w*, and the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*; I will \w set|strong="H7760"\w* in the \w desert|strong="H6160"\w* the fir \w tree|strong="H1265"\w*, \add and\add* the \w pine|strong="H8410"\w*, and the box \w tree|strong="H8391"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*:

That they may \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, and \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, and \w consider|strong="H7760"\w*, and \w understand|strong="H7919"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, that the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* this, and the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w created|strong="H1254"\w* it.

\w Produce|strong="H7126"\w* your \w cause|strong="H7379"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; bring \w forth|strong="H5066"\w* your \w strong|strong="H6110"\w* \add reasons\add*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w King|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.\f + \fr 41.21 \ft Produce: Heb. Cause to come near\f*

Let them bring \add them\add* \w forth|strong="H5066"\w*, and \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* us what shall \w happen|strong="H7136"\w*: let them \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* the former \w things|strong="H7223"\w*, what they \add be\add*, that we may \w consider|strong="H7760"\w* them, and \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the latter \w end|strong="H0319"\w* of them; or \w declare|strong="H8085"\w* us things for to \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.\f + \fr 41.22 \ft consider…: Heb. set our heart upon them\f*

\w Shew|strong="H5046"\w* the things that are to \w come|strong="H0857"\w* \w hereafter|strong="H0268"\w*, that we may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that ye \add are\add* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*: yea, do \w good|strong="H3190"\w*, or do \w evil|strong="H7489"\w*, that we may be \w dismayed|strong="H8159"\w*, and \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

Behold, ye \add are\add* of \w nothing|strong="H0369"\w*, and your \w work|strong="H6467"\w* of \w nought|strong="H0659"\w*: an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* \add is he that\add* \w chooseth|strong="H0977"\w* you.\f + \fr 41.24 \ft of nothing: or, worse than nothing\f*\f + \fr 41.24 \ft of nought: or, worse than of a viper\f*

I have raised \w up|strong="H5782"\w* \add one\add* from the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and he shall \w come|strong="H0857"\w*: from the \w rising|strong="H4217"\w* of the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* shall he \w call|strong="H7121"\w* upon my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: and he shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon \w princes|strong="H5461"\w* as \add upon\add* \w morter|strong="H2563"\w*, and as the \w potter|strong="H3335"\w* \w treadeth|strong="H7429"\w* \w clay|strong="H2916"\w*.

Who hath \w declared|strong="H5046"\w* from the \w beginning|strong="H7218"\w*, that we may \w know|strong="H3045"\w*? and \w beforetime|strong="H6440"\w*, that we may \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \add He is\add* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*? yea, \add there is\add* none that \w sheweth|strong="H5046"\w*, yea, \add there is\add* none that \w declareth|strong="H8085"\w*, yea, \add there is\add* none that \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* your \w words|strong="H0561"\w*.

The \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \add shall say\add* to \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* them: and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* one that bringeth good \w tidings|strong="H1319"\w*.

For I \w beheld|strong="H7200"\w*, and \add there was\add* no \w man|strong="H0376"\w*; even among them, and \add there was\add* no \w counsellor|strong="H3289"\w*, that, when I \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* of them, could \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* a \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 41.28 \ft answer: Heb. return\f*

Behold, they \add are\add* all \w vanity|strong="H0205"\w*; their \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \add are\add* \w nothing|strong="H0657"\w*: their molten \w images|strong="H5262"\w* \add are\add* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* and \w confusion|strong="H8414"\w*.
